1100000010111101 1101100001100011 1 -> sum: 1001100100100001, cout: 1
1111101100011001 0101100111011101 1 -> sum: 0101010011110111, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
